document_data.mainbody:
Xanatrar Hillhorn was the service-mage for the Auroras Realms Shop, Waterdeep Way Catalogue Counter in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep in the midâ€“1360s DR.
He was handsome and an excellent singer, which he demonstrated at parties and to impress the pretty ladies whom he had an eye for. He attended feasts hosted by nobles regularly.
